Ad Text:
About the Company
A leading ASX-listed manufacturing and distribution organisation with a national footprint and complex operations across multiple divisions. Known for its strong leadership, collaborative culture and commitment to developing finance talent, this business offers exposure to large-scale operations, sophisticated reporting and genuine career progression supported by experienced mentors.

About the Role
A commercial finance role partnering with the business to drive insight across profitability, costs and performance.

Key Responsibilities:

Ownership of distribution P&Ls, including monthly reporting, commentary, variance analysis and divisional performance insights
Preparation and consolidation of budgets and forecasts 
Management of freight allocations, warehouse charges and key cost drivers, including accruals and process improvement initiatives
Oversight of inventory provisions, obsolescence and scrap processes, ensuring reconciliation between operational systems and the general ledger
Preparation and analysis of sales, margin and customer profitability reporting, including analysis and corrective actions
Management of complex allocations, recharges and journals
Development and maintenance of KPIs and performance reporting
Preparation of payroll, marketing spend and profitability reports to support commercial decision-making
Acting as a trusted business partner to sales, operations and senior leadership on ad-hoc analysis, audits and strategic projects
Ideal Candidate
The role suits a Management Accountant or Analyst who enjoys complexity, thrives on stakeholder engagement and wants exposure to an ASX-listed environment with breadth and visibility.

3–5 years’ experience in a Management Accounting, Commercial Analyst or similar role
Commercial mindset with proven business partnering capability across non-finance stakeholders
Advanced Excel skills and experience working with large ERP
Comfortable working in a fast-paced, operationally complex environment
Experience in manufacturing, distribution or similar industry highly regarded
CA or CPA qualified preferred
Benefits
Competitive salary on offer, depending on experience
Hybrid - 2 days work from home 
Exposure to a listed business with scale and complexity
Strong mentorship from experienced finance leaders
Broad role with genuine career development and progression opportunities
Northern suburbs location with supportive culture
Apply Now
Please apply now using the appropriate link. 
*Cover letter not required.

Jessica Egan at Sharp & Carter
